title: One Of The Guys
description: An alternate cover for this ASIN can be found here.From Freshman, in High School, Chase and Logan have been best friends.However, Chase hasn't felt like just friends for a long time.As her feelings grow for her best friend, she becomes increasingly frustrated with his behavior towards her and one day, she snaps...It takes a new group of friends to make Chase see things differently, but when Logan decides he doesnâ€™t want to lose her, he goes out of his way to make her notice him.Chase has something up her sleeve that will have Logan regretting the day he let her go alone, and gives him something to think about. But, will it make him more determined to win her back, or will he leave her to get over their friendship for good?s...
author: Dawn Doyle
